original_text:
The iniquities of the wicked ensnare him,
    and he is held fast in the cords of his sin.
korean_text: 악인은 자기의 악에 걸리며 그 죄의 줄에 매이나니

sentences.original_text: The iniquities of the wicked ensnare him
and he is held fast in the cords of his sin.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 죄의 밧줄에 단단히 붙잡힙니다
